snippet.title: Sorry We're Closed - Six One Indie Showcase Trailer
snippet.description: The latest Sorry We're Closed trailer gives us a fresh look at the creepy world of this upcoming survival horror game, along with a release date reveal. Sorry We're Closed will be available on November 14, 2024 on PC (Steam, GOG, and Epic Games Store). Sorry We're Closed is a nostalgic, single-player survival horror game with rich lore, deep characters and multiple endings. Explore unsettling locations with fixed camera angles. Fight in first person with demonic weapons. Open your Third Eye to see between worlds, uncover secrets and solve puzzles.
